SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.terminal

Interface Terminal

All Superinterfaces:
EventEmitter<ResizeEvent>
All Known Implementing Classes:
LinuxTerminal, WindowsTerminal
public interface Terminal extends EventEmitter<ResizeEvent>
An interface that represents a terminal and provides methods to interact with it.

A terminal is also an EventEmitter that emits ResizeEvents when the terminal is resized.

See Also:
  • TerminalFactory

    Methods inherited from interface it.polimi.ingsw.am01.eventemitter.EventEmitter

    on, onAny, unregister

  • Method Details

    • enableRawMode

      void enableRawMode()
      Enable raw mode on the terminal. In raw mode, the terminal will not process input and will pass it directly to the program.

    • disableRawMode

      void disableRawMode()
      Disabled raw mode by returning the terminal to its original state, before enableRawMode() was called.

      Calling this method before enableRawMode() leads to undefined behaviour.

    • getDimensions

      Dimensions getDimensions()
      Get the current dimensions of the terminal.
      Returns:
      the dimensions of the terminal
